data.outcome_description: At 01:53 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava Sharma moved to dining_table_01 (ID: living_room_01).

data.narrative: At 01:53 PM on Thursday, May 22, 2025 (Local time for New York, New York), Ava carefully carries the container of chicken tikka masala from the kitchen into the living room, the scent of spices filling the air. She walks over to the **dining table (dining_table_01)**, the muted light from the cloudy afternoon casting a soft glow on the surface. She sets the container down, ready for a quick and efficient lunch before her afternoon meeting.
